language.entry: Magician

Straight forward in battle and personality, The Magician's scuffed and black cloak is both heavy enough for grazing blows and yet light enough to not slow down her relentless march forward in combat. This made all the more complete by her imposing hat. Mundane in nature, one can't help but feel a sort of magic when witnessing it

Believing power is key, The Magician arms herself with a mini-hakkero capable of storing magical energies to fuel it's own white-hot burning magic. Should things not go as planned, The Magician brings both her talents in more earthly witchcraft to bolster or patch up her companions, or her faithful broom to sweep the opposition back into place

Restless as ever, The Magician keeps her hands busy. Whether in the practice of witchcraft and mycology or in the business of others, The Magician is sure to have what you're looking for at short notice

Ordinary Magician
The fraility of humanity and it's limits, pushed to it's extremes by one most unlikely.
Casing the Joint

When we looked at the relics of the Ancestor, we saw the height civilization can attain.
When we looked at the ruins, we marked the danger of that height.
Only the mad or desperate, as they say
It helps if you don't dwell on what you lost
A magician's mercy isn't perfect
Hey, I don't judge what you drink
It never gets easier...
(sigh) The unavoidable cost of my talents
These ones aren't poisonous, I think?
Couple of these'll do you good
One makes you larger, the other makes you small
Sacrifices must be made to be strong
...and now for a drop of blood...
You got what you asked for, don't give me that look
I'll get you good as new, ze
Hang in there, stand in front of me and hold your head high!
Woah, you really want to use this skill?
Oh me? I'm the Miko!
Woah, wait! This magic's too unstable for that!
If you're me, then who am I?
Only takes one of me, ze
One of us is going to have to change
Not even breakin' a sweat, ze
Next.
Got any more fight in ya?
It's not over already, is it?
That was no ordinary hit, though!
Ha! Try and keep up with me
Get back up so I can hit you again
Extermination's just that easy, ze
At this pace we'll have time for drinks after
What a bore you turned out to be
Watch your heads!
Pretty good spell, right?
Outta' my way!
Gets the blood flowin'
If you want revenge, the name's Reimu Hakurei!
From stardust to dust
Neat trick, but I know better!
Woah, hey! Let go!
Spooky stuff, mind if I borrow that spell?
I knew you guys were behind this incident!
Ehh... my head...
So I get to keep these shells, right?
Did the fumes get to me again?
Whoops. You guys can forgive me, right?
That was the worst trip of my life
Come on, it's just a trick
Who wants to swap places??
You're a terrible dungeon master, you know?
What, you see something good?
what's the hold up?
Onwards!
No use stickin' around here
How about a song while we march?
Eh? Did you notice something?
I might have some extra torches
Did it just get a little darker?
You didn't cheap out on us, did ya?
I can make this work, ze
Hey boss, the light
Wait, wait! I see a sparkle of something in the distance!
I can do just fine in any darkness
More treasure right?
This naggin' feeling won't let up...
What'd I do to you?!
Hey, hey! You're mistaking me for someone else!
Enh... Now things are heatin' up
(spits) That the best ya' got?!
Not the face!
uhhhn... I'm getting tired...
Anyone got a bandage?!
Let me patch this wound up first!
Oh, I'm feelin' dizzy...
Where is it? I have something for this! Where is it?!
(grunts) That's not a good burn...
Hold on! That wounds nothin' I can't fix, ze!
Woah! I mean, you're gonna' be alright!
THAT'S CHEATING!
I'M SORRY!
WHO DID THIS?
IT'S ONLY FAIR!
ALL OF YOU, DE-
I'M GOING TO ALICE!
I'VE FAILED AGAIN!
NOT AGAIN!
It can't be the last adventure...
Sorry, friend...
There goes the good ending...
...How about we try that again, ze?
...Another chance, don't squander it!
...Did I have you worried there?
Back on your feet, this night isn't over!
Don't delay! Give as you've gotten!
Ugh, my head...
This place is getting on my nerves
Enough!
How much more of this?
Can we pick up the pace?!
Wait, don't- oh... never mind
These mushrooms all look the same, okay?!
I swear this has never happened to me before!
That's a perfectly normal reaction!
You're fine! It'll go away in a second, ze!
Maaaaster Spark!
Final Spark!
(wipes hands) They're not recoverin' from that!
Hah! Leave nothing left
Spark and burn it all down!
Not bad, but let me show you how to clear a room!
Tag me in!
Flashy! Not much power behind it though...
Don't waste time! Just wipe them out next time!
Annnd then enters the Magician!
(You sure you're not a witch too?)
(Tricks are no substitue for raw power!)
(Stalling for time as usual?)
(Eh? Did you do something?)
(I'm surprised you didn't blink out of here, heh.)
Some weather we're having, eh?
I'll show you how to really spark a fire, ze
Heh, earthquakes are just side-effects to me
s-s-stop th-that shaking, I'm getting earth sick
Great celestial power, uses it to throw rocks, I dig it
I can hold more than I look!
Ah, a reward to myself!
Buy a round for everyone, but bring them all to me. Alright?
You should be payin' me
Eh, you'll do
I got some talents as well, ze
How do I play this? I want to play this
I take all in everything I do
Clear a seat for me, or I will!
This is so boring...
Do I have to?
How long do I have to stay here?
How's this not just more sinning?!
This is like a kinkier brothel, yeah?
I want the cute one to do it for me
Don't expect any donations from me
This place looks as shoddy as Miko's shrine
I-I'm not gonna burst into flames when I walk in, right?!
So are we burnin' up some bad guys or what?
Guess I got more time to read sittin' here
Come on, there has to be some interesting stuff down there!
This kinda work is no sweat, ze
I'm not ready to give up now
Just let me take something before the show
Maybe just let me lay down for a bit?
Ask the lazy one in red, not me!
I can't enjoy my loot if I have no time to admire it!
Please, I need some time alone
This incident is madness!
I'd rather take my chances with the fiends than stay here
Is it really any safer up here?
Taking me would only be a mistake
Just leave me alone
You're mistaken if you think you've earned my loyalty
Don't approach me until you've raised the tavern's betting limit
Do not even think of sending me back with that last team
May I cull the heard?
I have more to give, send me back
I wonder how many I can take with me
The flowers refuse to grow here...
Don't take me from the moon's alluring gaze
(hic) C'mon, I didn't tell ya' to stop
I (hic) used to drink with oni, you know?
Hey, want to see a magic trick?
Hold still, or this'll burn!
One more try, I can win this time
Hey, not like it's my money I lost...
Can I go now? Please?
C'mon let me out of here!
So do I pretend to pray before or after the kneeling?
That looks expensive
What was my safe word again?
How's any of this have anything to do with the light?
Please don't tell me there's a secret monster after this
I just need a few more mushrooms, that'll fix me up...
Maybe I could use a long sleep...
I need to just be happy I made it out
So... if this is all just a loop, how's there a sequel?
That's it, I've had it! I should have been a solo heroine!
How about I make things more difficult for the rest of you, huh?!
This is why I don't partner up anymore!
Can't any of you get anything done?!
I can't take it anymore! Stop messing everything up!
Ugh, every day is like this with you guys
The only mistake I made was going along with you guys
I can't be seen with you guys
You think I want to listen to the one who got us into this mess?!
I think I know a little more about exterminations than you do, pal
What? Huh? Didn't catch that! heh
Woah you actually modded this to function, hope it wasn't too hard for someone like you!
Ugh, which of you set up this camp. It's a disaster
Wake me when everyone feels like trying
We're just going to get ambushed, why are you even trying?
Can't you put any power into it?
Weak hit, why'd we even bring you?
(claps) Woo! ...you meant to miss them right?
Oh come on!! Can't you do anything right?
Don't make it too hard for them or anything
You call that dodging?!
Get outta here, I'm not letting you mess things up
Like you could do any better
You'd just get us killed anyways
I don't think even magic can fix this situation
I'm not taking orders from anyone who messes up this bad
Don't touch you me, you filthy casual
No way, I don't need any of your botched help
You're just going to mess up anyways
Why did I think it was a good idea to come here...
I just wanted to fix things, why is this happening?!
I'm going to fail, aren't I...
I can't believe I tricked myself into this
There's no more continues for me
I can't do this, what was I thinking
There's no fixing this mess we're in
Where did I go wrong this time?!
Maybe I can still do this, may- Wuh, Oh! (falls)
I can't do anything from here... I can't do anything
Let me go, I can't stay here
This is all happening too fast
I'm just going to screw up again
Me? I'm just a fraud...
I'll just let you down, too
Offer it up to some shrine or something...
I can't eat, not like this
Ah! Just leave me alone!
What does it matter what I try to do?
You think a hack like me can follow your tactics?
Digging around in some hole, thinking I can find it, this is all pointless
I should just leave, you don't need me around here
Why did I think I could do this alone...
Come on, lets see what kind of heroine I really am
Let's go, I'm right here
Hnng... I fumbled the spell, this is bad
Another miscast... What did I expect?
Least I can do is die trying
You can go, I'm staying...
If I could be fixed, none of this would have happened in the first place
I don't deserve it
I'm fine, it wouldn't be fair
Some things can't be undone
Get away, I don't need your help
I'll just hurt them, too
You trust me to do that?
My hands are shaking, I can't do it
Look, just leave me alone
I'll just eat another mushroom, forget about me
You're wasting your time with me
I can't just keep borrowing power from others
You're still trying?
Some good that'll do
It's all falling apart!
I'm not even player 2, what chance did I really have?
It's really going to end like this?!
My spells, why aren't they enough?!
I can't get a good shot from here, yeah...
This isn't good...
No, I- Hey, hold my spot for me
Gameover!
This is getting ugly
A good leader knows when to retreat, right?!
I think you're breaking up, I didn't catch that!
Ask that shrine maiden, don't expect me to pull us through this!
How can we sleep in a place like this?!
Am I the only one who heard that?
Ah! I can't focus! My spells!
Was that even dodgeable?!
(opens eyes) Oh... oh wow
Are they mocking me?!
Come on! Kill them! We're all gonna die down here!
Oh my- We're doomed!
Are you relying on me to keep you alive?!
They're hitting them! Then they're going to hit me!
I thought you were a goner for sure!
Great, but there's no running the clock down here!
Sure, yeah, soon as my legs start listening to me again!
No! This is a blindspot!
Aren't things bad enough?
You want me to what?!
It's too dangerous, you can't just mess with these sorts of things
It all makes sense now, I was the protagonist all along!
Fear not, my burdensome allies, for I shall magic us away!
Adore me, shower me in your praise!
It can’t be stopped now, haha!
Masterspark! Masterspark! Masterspark!
I can't beat the shit out of you if I don't get closer!
Ah, but I want to use these skills instead!
Change places!
Can I take another step? I've done everything I can
Right here, this is the spot. Mhmm
Forget about that bum of a miko! All you need is me!
Your admiration is just not enough
More! Praise my heroism!
To act now would rob me of a dramatic finish
The heroine always swoops in at the last minute
Haha! Of course you would mod the game for someone as great as I!
Food? No, I prefer japanese
Quit botherin' me, I'm planning my great triumph
You don't give me orders, I'm the extermination expert here!
I'm not just for show!
I play the lead, I'm no one's second string
I deserve far more than you
They're saying I'm crazy
A true heroine never rests, we should be on the move
Will you notice me now!?
This magician is anything but ordinary!
Yeah! Attack me! I'm who you have to worry about!
I'm the real dodge expert, unlike that depressing old maid!
Hey, hey! That's nothing, look what I'm about to do!
What?! Stop it! I can do better than that!
Hehe, typical of a side character
I'll pick up that slack, ze
I will pro- oh, they missed
I think I intimidated them into missing!
You're not taking the glory away from me!
Everyone can get the best view of me here!
I don't need that, just watch!
Don't mistake me for someone who needs donations
You think you'll get a share of my praise?
Healing? You think I'll lose don't you?!
I don't need a side kick!
Help me? I don't need anyone's help, ze
Can't waste time patching up weaknesses
Why both, you still won't be as great as me
Your praise alone is enough
I'm already perfect, ze
My spell! This doesn't happen to the heroine!
I, but, my spell failed. My spell isn't supposed to fail!
And look like a coward?
You're trying to make me look bad!
So you're finally taking me serious
But, I'm the protagonist...
Found the red shirt
I'd never have gotten hit by that!
So this is how it's gonna go, huh?
Further I go into the night
All I know now is the chemicals pulsating
Maybe, covered in red, I can feel weightless too
Come on, let me get closer
Outta my way, this is my fight now
Send me into that eternal rest if you can!
Come on, come on! Don't make me wait!
Heh, I think I've got something better in mind
Pff, whatever. I know what I gotta do, ze
Get that out of my face
Nah, I don't think I need food anymore
If someone's not coming back, I don't care if it's me
It's the least I can do
When a spell fails, it reminds me I'm still human
Arcane lacerations and chemical burns, they're better than any promise charm
Lets burn out in a blaze of glory!
The funs just beginning!
Yeah, like that, show me what you're made of!
What, scared? You call that a hit?
Really? I don't think there's an easier mode
You need a gilded invitation or something?
Feel it burn up inside you!
That pain is the spark of life!
I like it here, back off
You're not getting me to move
Get that out of my face
I've got two just like it already
I'm self medicated
I'll take my chances
And make this easier? Boring!
Can't hear you, not listening!
Ugh! Can we just get moving again?
Wasn't my idea to set up camp
This is why we're wasting time here?
I just want to get back in the fight already
Come on! We're just postponing the inevitable
When you realize you can just stop sleeping all together, your mind just... psssh, yeah
It's treason then!
Which of you is to blame for this incident?!
I've got eyes on all of you now!
I won't turn a blind eye any longer
Yeah, I don't think it's in my best interest to stay in the front
I did my part, why are you hesitating to help?
One of you is the culprit, plotting our demise
If I can't trust myself, how can I trust any of you?!
(incoherent muttering)
And just walk into an obvious trap?
I know what I really should be concerned with
Does this put a wrench in your plans?
Have you been messing with the code?!
I didn't make it, why would I eat it
I'll stick to mushrooms
Yeah, I'll take all of the night watches
Don't think I'll turn my back so easily
Who let that one through?!
There's no way I'd get hit unless someone's... cheating
A graze, but you were hoping for something more, weren't you?
Points? I've got a few points for you dastardly folk
Hey! What were you trying to do there?
You can't sell it at all!
Are you throwing?!
Don't think this rules you out
A convenient miss
No way you messed that up, you tried to miss!
No way, I'm where I want to be
Yeah, I bet you want me to move there
How can I trust this is safe?
(sniff) Nice try, I don't think so
I'd rather roll my save
You'll have to catch me first
Eh? You're just trying to undermine me!
I'll pass, there's no telling what you're planning
You want my secrets? You can have 'em after I'm dead!
These rituals are dangerous, you might disrupt it and then...
You stay on your side of the log!
Unhand me!
Is this incident your doing, perhaps?
I didn't come here just to be sent back
Back off! These kills are mine
I'm not here to be your heroine!
We're all here for ourselves, lets stop pretending we aren't
Do this, do that, is it not enough my back is strainin' under your weight?!
Come on, come on, get to me already!
Okay, watch this. Maybe You'll learn somethin'
There better be a kill set up for me
I got a better move to do next
Move it
Someone else handle the front
I need a better view
Eh, they can clean up
What? Now?
Don't tell me how to do my job!
Maybe the sun waits for you to tell 'em what to do?
